content: SINGAPORE  Aug 1 Huaneng Power   the listed arm of China's biggest power generator  saw its first-half net profit plummet 96 percent  hit by a sharp rise in coal prices.
name: Huaneng Power International Inc
title: China's Huaneng Power H1 net profit plunges on high coal prices

content: SINGAPORE  March 21 Huaneng Power   the listed business of China's biggest power generator  saw its 2016 net profit fall by a third  logging the first decline in five years as a tepid Chinese economy kept electricity usage weak.
name: Huaneng Power International Inc
title: China's Huaneng Power posts first profit fall in 5 years

content: HONG KONG  March 24 Huaneng Power International Inc   China's largest power producer  posted its weakest annual profit growth in three years due to a slowing economy reducing electricity demand and asset writedowns.
name: Huaneng Power International Inc
title: China's Huaneng Power posts weakest annual profit growth in three years
